title: Priyanka Chopra embraces faux fur for her fall fashion look as she saunters through New York City
text:
Priyanka Chopra got all bundled up with a fashionable fall look while out and about in New York City on Wednesday.

The 37-year-old actress rocked a faux fur look while stepping out in the Big Apple, without her husband Nick Jonas.

The Bollywood star was all smiles while heading out solo in a stylish, mostly black ensemble.

Priyanka out: Priyanka Chopra got all bundled up with a fashionable fall look while out and about in New York City on Wednesday

The India native stepped out wearing a stylish black and white patterned blouse with a few buttons unbuttoned, revealing a gold necklace with a pendant of her first name.

She was also wearing form-fitting black pants with a faux fur black puffer coat with black leather boots.

The Baywatch star completed her look with a black handbag with thick black sunglasses and gold hoop earrings.

Priyanka's look: The India native stepped out wearing a stylish black and white patterned blouse with a few buttons unbuttoned, revealing a gold necklace with a pendant of her first name

Chopra revealed in a new interview on Today that she's looking forward to starting a family with her husband Nick Jonas, who she married in December 2018.

'I can't wait. I really can't wait,' Chopra told Today host Hoda Kotb. 'I mean there's so much that happens in our lives that whenever God blesses us with that it's something that we both definitely want.'

Her stance appears to be a change of heart from March, when she told People that starting a family is, 'not something I think about very much.'

Family: Chopra revealed in a new interview on Today that she's looking forward to starting a family with her husband Nick Jonas, who she married in December 2018

Both husband and wife are both quite busy, with Chopra doing press for her new movie The Sky Is Pink, in theaters October 11.

She also stars in director Robert Rodriguez's upcoming action drama We Can Be Heroes, alongside Boyd Holbrook, Christian Slater and Pedro Pascal.

The actress is also filming a new Indian movie Gangubai, and she's also attached to star in another Indian film Gustakhiyan, based on the life of poet Sahir Ludhianvi.

Press time: Both husband and wife are both quite busy, with Chopra doing press for her new movie The Sky Is Pink, in theaters October 11

Her husband Nick Jonas will be on the road for the rest of 2019 and the first two months of 2019 on The Jonas Brothers' Happiness Begins tour.

The brothers' next tour stop is at Rogers Arena in Vancouver on Friday, October 11, followed by the Tacoma Dome in Tacoma, Washington on October 12 and the Moda Center in Portland, Oregon on October 13.

The North American leg of their tour wraps up New Year's Eve with a performance at Fontainebleau in Miami Beach, FL, with their European leg spanning from late January to late February 2020.

On the road: Her husband Nick Jonas will be on the road for the rest of 2019 and the first two months of 2019 on The Jonas Brothers' Happiness Begins tour
description: Priyanka Chopra got all bundled up with a fashionable fall look while out and about in New York City on Wednesday.
